hero.title: Transform fair notes into actionable insights
hero.subtitle: Quick sales analysis for small producers and workshops. 100% local, no data sent to servers.
hero.privacy: Your data stays on your device. No information is sent to external servers.

problem.title: The Problem
problem.item1: Unorganized notes on paper or TXT
problem.item2: Hard to know which products sell more
problem.item3: No clear view of revenue and trends

solution.title: The Solution
solution.item1: Import your TXT and generate automatic dashboard
solution.item2: See top products, categories and trends

step1.title: Send your TXT
step1.description: Drag your fair notes files or select from computer. Accepts multiple files.

step2.title: Automatic Processing
step2.description: The system reads, categorizes and organizes your sales automatically. All in your browser.

step3.title: See Insights and Export
step3.description: Dashboard with KPIs, charts and suggestions. Export standardized CSV whenever you want.

privacy.title: 100% Local and Private
privacy.description: Your sales data never leaves your device. All processing happens in your browser. You decide if you want to save locally or use private session.

q1.question: What file format does it accept?
q1.answer: Accepts TXT files with your fair notes in simple format (date + products + values). Also accepts CSV generated by the system itself to reimport.

q2.question: How many files can I send?
q2.answer: You can send multiple files at once (e.g. 4 fairs of the month). The system consolidates everything into a single dashboard.

q3.question: Is my data saved?
q3.answer: By default, no. You use in 'private session' and can delete everything when closing. If you want, you can choose to save locally in your browser to reopen later.

q4.question: Does it work offline?
q4.answer: After loading the page once, it works offline. All processing is local, no internet needed.

cta.title: Ready to have clarity in your sales?
cta.subtitle: Start now. Takes less than 2 minutes.
